Other mission types add variety, and include Patrol, Intercept, and Strategic Bombing.
title: Jane's Attack Squadron

description: A must-have for Alfred Hitchcock fans has arrived. Make your way through puzzles, clues and even clips from films in the Alfred Hitchcock world in this adventure game for the PC. For gamers and movie buffs, this game isn't one, but many Alfred Hitchcock movies compiled together to make a game worth playing. Do you have what it takes or are you too scared?
title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents: The Final Cut

description: Inspired by the restaurant whose slogan is "Delightfully Tacky, Yet Unrefined," this game is more than just a road trip -- it's the ultimate race. There can truly be no reward as fulfilling as getting to hang out with the Hooters waitresses, and that's what you'll get if you can manage to keep your mind on the track and win a few races in Hooters Road Trip. Choose your muscle car and head out into competition, trying to outrun the other guys in a series of driving tests. There are more than a dozen cars (some have to be unlocked through skilled driving), and races will take you to such places as Florida and California. The promise of meeting the Hooters girls is quite a bit of incentive, and the computer AI opponents respond accordingly.
title: Hooters Road Trip

description: It's time to get out your board and hit the waves with TransWorld Surf. Pull off massive air, wicked tricks and awesome tailslides just like the pros of surfing. With amazingly realistic water, it's time to hit one of 20 breaks to see if you have what it takes to impress the people on the beach. It's totally awesome dude!
title: TransWorld Surf

description: It would be great enough to get to play as Spider-Man in a video game, but this GBA take on the comic book lets you play as Tobey Maguire playing Spider-Man! Confused? Well, this video game is based on the motion picture version of the comic, which means there are plenty of modern-day updates to the time-honored saga. Certain things never change, however, and Green Goblin is still Spidey's evil arch-nemesis. The action takes place in (where else?) New York City, and there's plenty of web slinging and wall crawling to keep aspiring superheroes busy. Unfortunately, Green Goblin isn't the enemy you'll encounter; Shocker, Vulture, and a series of mechanized meanies from good old Oscorp Industries will try to stop you throughout the adventure. Not to worry: With an endless supply of webbing, plus your bare fists and tireless legs, there's no one you can't defeat. Can you save the city from certain peril?
platforms: GBA PC GCN PS2 PS2 Xbox
title: Spider-Man: The Movie

description: In this third-person action game based on Sam Raimi's blockbuster movie, players assume the role of Peter Parker and his alter-ego Spider-man to defend the city from the clutches of evil. The game starts off with Peter in his wrestling costume, but soon as has players learn and master all-new combat moves, webslinging and dizzying airborne acrobatics. Move through stunning scenes from the movie as you explore enormous city environments with newfound maneuverability. Battle the world's toughest villains, including Shocker, Vulture, and the Green Goblin. The game features unlockable secrets like mini games, new costumes and DVD extra features.
platforms: PS2 GBA GBA PC GCN Xbox
title: Spider-Man: The Movie

description:
Finally, a videogame that understands soccer really is a contact sport.

RedCard 20-03's unique adrenaline-style gameplay lets you kick, score, celebrate and tackle your way through 50 international teams all vying for the Cup Championship.

The unique Midway Sports-style experience combined with lightning game speed, stunning next-generation graphics and authentic soccer action make RedCard 20-03 the must-have soccer title on the next-gen systems.
title: RedCard 20-03

description: The popular Super NES RPG continues with the next epic quest in the Breath of Fire series. Re-enter the magical life of hero Ryu, a dragon morphing warrior, as he unknowingly embarks on a vast adventure in search of his missing father and little sister. Eight characters will join you along the way to help you find and master the hidden secrets of the vast landsyou will explore. Discover how the right combinations of magical spells, strength, wisdom, guts and luck will come into play in determining your fate as you roam the world of dragons, demons and mystery. A new "community system" lets you build and develop your own town. Supports the Link Cable for item exchanges.
platforms: GBA SNES Wii U Wii New 3DS
title: Breath of Fire II

description: Based on a 1969 British film of the same name, THE ITALIAN JOB is packed with the sort of retro style and high-adrenaline plots that will have people talking about it for years to come. Structured like a full-length movie, this third-person driving adventure blends classic storytelling with high AI and creative challenges to create a gripping ride. Like any good car-chase flick, the game has you weaving in and out of traffic (auto and pedestrian), navigating city streets and rural environments alike. Taking place in London, Turin, and the Swiss Alps, THE ITALIAN JOB's main plot involves you stealing a bunch of gold bullion without the Mafia or the local police noticing. This will require speeding around in the sewers, jumping about on the rooftops, and doing whatever it takes to confuse your pursuers. You'll be driving as many as 13 different vehicles throughout the chase (mini-Coopers are among them), which means you'll have to adjust to the different physics of each.
platforms: PS PS2 GCN PC Xbox Cell
title: The Italian Job

description: Earthworm Jim returns in a madcap chase across the galaxy saving cows and thwarting lawyers all the way. Whip, run, jump and Snot swing your way through 10 of the most outrageous and untraditional levels anywhere. Returning favorite characters include; Princess What's-Her-Name, Psy-Crow, Peter Puppy, Bob the Goldfish, and several new villains as well! See Jim in disguise as blind cave salamander (no, really?we're not kidding on this one!). Earthworm Jim 2 is crazy, action-packed and senselessly humorous fun for all ages.
platforms: GBA SNES Gen PS PC Wii Saturn
title: Earthworm Jim 2

description: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind is an epic, open-ended single-player roleplaying game set in a gigantic 3D world where you create and play any kind of character you can imagine. Be the noble hero embarking on an epic quest, or an insidious thief rising to leadership of his guild. Be a malevolent sorcerer developing the ultimate spell of destruction, or a reverent healer searching for the cure to a plague. Your actions define your character, and your gameplay changes and evolves in response to your actions. Confront the assassins' guild, and they take out a contract on you. Impress them, and they try to recruit you instead. No two sagas are the same in the world of Morrowind.
title: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind

description:
After the Great War, tensions rise and an assault on your homeland ensues. The enemy has swept ashore and is bent on conquering your tiny nation. You parachute onto a tiny island with the mission of interdicting passing enemy supply ships and troop transports, preventing the invading force from subjugating your country.

Featuring a variety of vintage weaponry from the era, in Operation Blockade you earn more advanced weaponry as you progress through the game. This is critical as time continues towards the latter half of the decade, a military build-up and the next battle storm. Facing you are air, land and sea forces that rival those of any nation. Carriers and their deadly assortment of fighter-attack planes and bombers; paratroopers, PT boats, submarines and landing craft all set out to eradicate your small blocking force.
title: Operation Blockade

description:
EA Sports Big, the label known for leading-edge extreme sports titles, speeds into the world of extreme motocross with Freekstyle 2002. If you don't have the guts to hit a 40-foot launch at 70 mph, you don't belong here, 'cause that's the only way to grab the big air you need to pull off 80 insane freestyle tricks. There's no room for fear.

Real-life riders like Mike Metzger, Clifford "The Flyin' Hawaiian" Adpptante, and Jessica Patterson are available to choose from, each with his or her own bike, outfit, and riding style. Ride through nine venues looking for hidden shortcuts, or roam freely over the freestyle tracks. Master the moves to earn the points and speed boosts familiar to extreme sports games. You can also challenge a second player to race via split-screen.
title: Freekstyle

description: Capcom continues Mega Man's cyber adventure series with more online chaos. Return to the futuristic universe inside cyber space and join Mega Man.EXE in the battle to fight cyber crimes in this mega role playing adventure. This time, there is a new net crime organization in town and its computer hacking has created a virus that's quickly gaining momentum. It's up to Mega Man.EXE, his pal Lan and friends to join the Net-battlers and win this new cyber battle. Stop it before it spreads! The game serves up hidden and more varied Battle Chips to discover, collect and trade with your friends (via Link Cable). Also supports two-player link-up tournaments.
title: Mega Man Battle Network 2

description: This isn't your grandfather's FROGGER, to be certain; taking the time-tested premise of the coin-operated favorite, FROGGER: The Great Quest translates the action to pure 3D, with dozens of gameplay hours to keep you hopping. Frogger, as it goes, has grown weary of his life in the old Firefly Swamp, and he sets out on a grand adventure to find the girl of his dreams a princess whose kiss can transform the green guy into a real prince. Aided by his Fairy Frogmother and the three wishes she's granted him, Frogger will have to traverse 20 gigantic levels of varied terrain. You'll try to lead our hero to journey's end without falling prey to the scores of villains that stand in the way. In another departure from the original game, Frogger has a weapon: He can spit a gooey substance from his mouth in order to deter foes. Throw in some truly horrific (and hilarious) cutscenes, and you've got one incredible game.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older
title: Frogger Advance: The Great Quest

description: E.T. is in serious trouble, and needs your help! You must race against time to save him from the government agents, scientists and law enforcement officers that are trying to catch him. YOUR MISSION: Assemble the transmitter that will allow E.T. to "phone home", then arrange for him to be picked up by his spaceship before it's too late! E.T. needs your help; go save him?
title: E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial

description: Reap the rewards of racing through an entire season of pulse pounding motocross action while upgrading your gear and bike along the way. For free ride madness compete in the all-new freestyle career mode dazzling the crowd with new tricks and sick maneuvers. Or simply ride the open terrain searching for secret areas without the burden of competition. It?s your bike - now ride!
title: MX Superfly

description: An arcade-style golf game, Outlaw Golf features numerous comic golfers competing on unusual courses, such as a swamp where your caddy can be munched on by a "friendly" gator.
rating_content: Mature Sexual Themes, Mild Animated Violence, Mild Realistic Violence, Strong Language
title: Outlaw Golf

description: With professional riders to choose from and authentic courses modeled using actual satellite data players will be able to race, pull amazing tricks, and compete for fame in freestyle mode or open terrain.
title: MX Superfly

description: F1 2002 will be the first Formula One game to feature the new 2002 season when it launches. Officially licensed by Formula One Administration Limited, it features real drivers, teams, cars and tracks from the 2002 FIA Formula One World Championship and it will be available at the start of the brand new season allowing the true Formula One aficionado the opportunity to play along as the real life drama unfolds.
title: F1 2002

description: Created by PuzzleKings, ZooCube takes puzzlers to a whole new dimension - the third dimension. Around the world, animals have been transformed by shape-altering science experiments and need help in returning to their natural state. Players use their ZooCube to rescue and return the animals to the flying ark.
title: ZooCube

description: Test Drive is reborn with more racing action and thrills than anything before. Race through four international cities in more than 20 high-end sports cars as you sprint for the checkered flag and all the glory that goes with it. Remember, though, you'll have to watch out for more than just the competition: traffic, pedestrians, and especially the cops who can take you out of a race in a split second if you aren't careful. The excitement, intensity, and danger of street racing are yours for the taking with Test Drive.
title: Test Drive

description: Step right up and get your frag on with QUAKE III: Arena for the MAC. Choose from a variety of weapons and a ton of maps and turn your opponents into dripping piles of flesh. You've got three gameplay options to choose from: against bots, a split-screen Four-Player mode, and network play, where you can go online and strut your stuff against some of the best players in the country. If you liked QUAKE III: Arena on the PC, then you're going to love it on the MAC.
platforms: Mac PC DC PS2 NDS Xbox 360
title: Quake III: Arena

description:
In the year 2050 China has become the world's deadliest power and has squashed all resistance with brutal force while attempting to build a new super technology that will render world peace obsolete. The only team on the planet that can end this threat is yours, and so begins BAM! Entertainment's intense flight actioner,

! Using the latest in PS2 technology,

offers a playable area of more than 1600 square kilometers in realistic locations like Columbia, Kazakhstan, North Africa, and China itself. A variety of high-technology air and ground combat craft are yours to control, as players pilot their escort fighters, recon planes, battle tanks, and state of the art

all over the world.
title: Dropship: United Peace Force

description: Adopting a dog should be one of the most rewarding experiences in a child's life. Young Lilo a Hawaiian girl who sets out to get her very own canine receives a bit of a shock when she discovers that her new pup is actually a space alien in disguise! Stitch, an extra-terrestrial criminal, was in transport to an intergalactic prison when his ship crashed on Earth. Now, he's hiding two of his six legs and posing as a pooch in order to evade the alien police. Play as both Lilo and Stitch in this adaptation of the animated Disney film of the same name. Each successive level alternates between the two characters, and the gameplay is completely different depending on which of the delightful personalities you inhabit; Stitch's levels are straight-ahead 2D scrolling adventures, while Lilo's boards focus on near-3D puzzle solving and creative mind benders. The graphics are cool throughout the whole journey, and the gameplay is completely addicting. Whether or not you've seen the movie, you'll fall in love with LILO & STITCH.
title: Lilo & Stitch

description: Gore is a first-person 3D action shooter. Its involved storyline moves the player through three different episodes: post-apocalyptic Earth, medieval Earth, and an alien homeworld. Each environment has its own style and content, including new monsters, weapons and abilities. Gore has indoor, outdoor, low-gravity environments and more.
title: Gore: Ultimate Soldier

description: Extreme Paintbrawl 4 features 12 characters playing across 12 immerse levels. The game supports sound EFX and gameplay modes such as Center Flag, Capture the Flag, Elimination and Gauntlet in addition to the online multi-player modes that the game also hosts.
title: Extreme PaintBrawl 4

description: The Ring Has A New King! Climb into the squared circle and go head-to-head with the baddest bunch of boxers around. Duck, jab and clobber your way to the championship title!
title: Punch King

description: Take control of many of your favourite wrestlers in this re-developed version of the upcoming PS2 title. The game features 42 legendary wrestlers, and allows players to link deadly combos together with a single button press. The game also features Create-a-Legend mode, in-depth match analysis and career guidance by real managers, five match types, career modes, wrestler customising, interactive ring entrances and much more.
title: Legends of Wrestling

description: Get behind the wheel of the world's most famous monster trucks with a brutal arsenal of weapons and go head-to-head in savage vehicular combat. Jump in, hold on, and grind it out through interactive arenas with multiple sub-levels, tricks, traps, and surprises.  Choose any of your favorite licensed Monster Trucks, including Grave Digger, Bulldozer, Gunslinger, Predator, Wild Thang and more. Play for total carnage as you master your tricks of play including a Freestyle session and the no-holds-barred Championship mode where your rewards pay off in the ultimate in Monster Truck Destruction.
title: Monster Jam: Maximum Destruction

description: With countless traps to avoid, rooms to explore, puzzles to solve and mysteries to uncover, each lurking horror survived will take you closer to the source of the RESIDENT EVIL. Survival is your only option.
title: Resident Evil Gaiden

description: Players choose to step into the ring as of one of 16 currently active professional or 4 custom boxers in this realistic heavyweight boxing simulation. Designed as a complete sports action game that will appeal to both boxing enthusiasts and video game fans alike, Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing brings the heavyweight division to brutal reality with its gritty graphics and dazzling animation engine. Also boasting a unique -- unlock system, players will have the opportunity to earn additional boxers, taunts, themes and signature moves as they move up through the ranks. Best of all, players have the option of assuming the role of the mighty 'Iron' Mike Tyson himself, or taking on his console counterpart for the heavyweight championship title.
title: Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing

description: Can you save society from criminals? Play as Konoko, an agent of the Tech Crimes Task Force, as you make your way through level after stunning level in pursuit of the bad guys. Taking a page from anime classics and modern day action movies, ONI presents a rich, involved action or adventure story to keep you playing for days on end. Featuring full-contact action, the game emphasizes both gunplay and hand-to-hand fighting. Each level has been planned and executed by architects using the AutoCAD system, resulting in a high degree of realistic detail and thoughtful design.
title: Oni

description: The Skaarj war is over, but fighting between the different factions and the mysterious and bloodthirsty Phayder are escalating. A Tournament is held to contain competition. Soon, this turns from a few gladiatorial combats between convicts into major public events and the biggest source of income for the Liandri Corporation. Several factions will be competing in this year's tournament, each with their motives. You are a member of one of them, and must prove to be worthy of facing Xan Kriegor himself in each of the 43 maps, mastering the 11 weapons at your disposal and confronting the most powerful computer AI to date - or your friends in multiplayer mode.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: Unreal Tournament [1999]

description: The year is 1812. Napoleon's army is on the march, and it's every empire for itself. As "Supreme Commander," you'll seize territories, crush your enemies, and betray your allies in a fast-paced, ruthless quest for world domination. Play the Classic Game under the familiar rules, trading cards for armies and rolling the dice to outdo your opponent. Play the Simultaneous-Turn option for a whole new Risk experience that includes I-COM communication and negotiation features, territory depth enhancements and territory bidding. Risk II is the ultimate form of this game of world domination that people of all ages have enjoyed for forty years!
title: Risk II

description: Building upon the foundation set by the earlier games of the MADDEN series, MADDEN 2000 sports an increased framerate, more detailed player models, and a more in-depth Franchise mode. If you're looking for something different, you can try the Madden Challenge mode, which challenges gamers to complete objectives like recovering an onside kick or scoring first in overtime. If you complete these objectives you are given points, which you can then use to purchase players or stadiums.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older
title: Madden NFL 2000

description: Majesty is a unique sim putting you in the crushed velvet hot seat of your own kingdom. With an epic quest before you, you make the decisions of where to build your settlement's guilds and temples. From these you recruit a varied cast of larger-than-life heroes. Each one has a mind of his own and must be enticed to meet your goals, via rewards you offer and spells you cast. Meanwhile you must make sure that your treasury stays flush with cash to support these and other outlays necessary to maintain a thriving medieval town. The fact that you are being barraged by attacks from mythical beasts and fantastic creatures doesn't make your job any easier.
title: Majesty: The Fantasy Kingdom

description:
From Sammy, the developer behind Guilty Gear X, comes Lethal Skies. Originally released in Japan under the name Sidewinder F back in December, Lethal Skies is an air combat game. With gameplay that reminiscent of the Ace Combat series and visuals to match, Lethal Skies puts players in a world suffering from global warming. In this dark world a sinister group called the World Order Reorganization Front (WORF) has risen from nothingness and taken power. Taking on the role of a pilot for the International Alliance elite Team SW, players must destroy the WORF by any means necessary.

Featuring over 20 missions, 13 aircrafts (including the F-15, F-16, F-18, F-22 and the Su-27) and intense air-to air combat, Lethal Skies is one title that no PlayStation 2 owner should go without.
title: Lethal Skies: Elite Pilot -- Team SW

description:
Developed by the UK-based production crew at Rage Software,

takes the fun of rally-style driving and combines it with the excitement of competitive racing. Journeying through the most exotic locations of the African continent,

features 19 different circuit locales ranging from safari treks and lagoons, to the countryside and jungle. It also has a wide selection of officially licensed and internationally recognized vehicles (such as Ford, Mitsubishi, Subaru, Renault, and Pontiac among others), as well as a variety of single and multiplayer game modes and a three-dimensional surround sound presentation.
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older
title: GTC Africa

description: A 3D incarnation of the beloved bombing action game series, Bomberman Generation feature fully cel-shaded graphics -- with more than 90 levels and five unique worlds, there's more sheer gameplay here than you'll ever be able to digest. Players will explore a huge 3D land, solving puzzles and fighting enormous boss foes. Using power-ups and bombs Bomberman will have to battle through 5 different worlds, holding 16 levels each.
title: Bomberman Generation

description:
ENDGAME combines pick up and play light gun action with stunning graphics, and cinematic action to deliver the ultimate next gen shoot-em-up.

ENDGAME is set in a world where Virtual Reality pioneered by EuroDream Technologies, is now commonplace, and is days from a new software update. But there is something very wrong with this update? Tyler knew what, but he was abducted; Octavian, an Artificial Intelligence, knows how to stop it, but needs a human. Only Jade Cornell knows what to do, and she has a gun?

In a dual bid to track Tyler and activate Octavian, Jade blasts across the United States of Europe. The deeper in she goes the more ruthless EuroDream security becomes. And still, Jade doesn't know the secret behind the security chief's identity, or realise Octavian is more complex than he seems.
title: Endgame

description: The world's wildlife population has been transformed in a series of shape-altering science experiments, and it's up to you to help the critters regain their regular forms. One of the most original and addicting puzzle games to come around in years, ZOOCUBE features near-3D graphics and a seemingly endless supply of levels. There are seven gameplay modes to master, and you can play alone or link up and square off against a friend. If only every puzzle game were this creative.
title: ZooCube

description: Use the amazing combo of moves provided to outwit the world's great female players.  Also, this game features different court surfaces, which also affect the bounce and spin of the ball.  Singles and Double friendlies can be played against any of the WTA stars.  Four major tournaments are offered, success in which will see the player rising through the WTA ranks.
title: WTA Tour Tennis

description: Red Card Soccer takes your traditional soccer video games and gives them a nice, swift kick. Fans will be treated to many modes of play including Friendly Mode, Party Mode and Cup Mode. Players can also expect to see 32 real-life soccer teams from around the world. 11-on-11 soccer action is on its way and it's going to more than just a walk in the park.
title: RedCard 20-03

description:
Stabbed in the back, left for dead in the streets outside of a European cafe Eike, the main character in Shadow of Destiny starts. Developed and published by Konami fans of the PlayStation 2 version might find the name Shadow of Destiny familiar as it was released on the system a while ago. While feeling the last ouch of life leaving him, Eike meets a supernatural being known only as Homuculus who restores his life. With new life Eike is given a device called digipad, which allows him to travel back in time. Using this device Eike must stop the many attempts on his life that took place before his death.

Stunning visuals, complex puzzles, riddles and plot twists await Eike as he tries to unravel the shroud of mystery cloaking his would-be killer.
title: Shadow of Destiny

description:
You are one of three air masters, Ciel, Copain and Femme, who are hired to protect the Eternal Engine.  This is an engine capable of perpetual motion in Sky Gunner but little do you realize that the diabolical criminal genius, Ventre, is planning to use the town's celebration aboard the luxury airship, Merveilleux, as an opportunity to steal the Eternal Engine for his own devilish purposes.

In Sky Gunner, play one of three pilots (Ciel, Femme, Copain) in an anime fantasy world with exotic flying machines. A unique avatism to target camera is employed to keep you focused on the dog-fighting.
title: Sky Gunner
